extends java.lang.Object
    Utils to manage PDSC XmlTag objects NOTE : all functions in someNameUils class do not change the instance of the object

      • compareTagText

        public static boolean compareTagText(XmlTag tag1,
                                     XmlTag tag2)
        Compare 2 tags, the comparison take place only on the "textual component" of the tag. This menas that the 2 tags are first converted in xml and the resulting xml was compared.
        Parameters:
        tag1 - tag to compare
        tag2 - tag to compare
        Returns:
        true if textual component of tags are equals

        level - starting indentation level (usually 0)

      • dependencyCheck

        public static boolean dependencyCheck(XmlTag parent)
        Dependencies research on xml tag (graph). uncomment all Sytem.out.println(), run program and press add button on tag customization frame to see how it works (based on Breadth first search)
        Parameters:
        parent - tag on which check dependency
        Returns:
        first missing dependency
